name: The Concept Agency
tag_list: marketing, public-relations, start-ups, communications, social-media, visibility, reputation, market-analysis, media-relations, analyst-relations, blogger-relations
description: Marketing and PR for Tech Companies
overview:
The Concept Agency is a boutique communications and public relations firm specializing in technology companies. With offices in San Francisco and Seattle and deep roots in Silicon Valley, the veteran team has provided strategic communications to some of the most well-known companies and start-ups in their industries for more than two decades.

The Concept Agency is small by design. With founders heralding from multinational agencies and consultants with decades of experience, Concept designs each account team with seasoned, subject-matter experts highly relevant to individual client businesses.

Services include: Awards programs Blog tracking & analysis Case studies Competitive intelligence Copywriting Employee communications Executive visibility International media relations Issues management Media, analyst & blogger relations Media events & promotions Media tours & conferences Media training News bureaus Newsletters Partner collaboration Presentations & demo scripts Press kit development Product & company launches Product reviews program Promotions & events Sales materials Social media communications Speakers’ bureaus Strategic messaging & positioning Trade show support
